name: Shattered Dreams
description:
#ZostanWDomuRobGry

First prototype ever made.

You were so excited to play the game, but unfortunately your desire to keep clicking the Play button has destroyed the world, leaving only only some shapes and you...

Take up on the journey through what's left and rebuild the universe once more.

Controls:
Arrow key UP: Jump
Arrow keys LEFT/RIGHT: Move Left/Right

Please play in 1920x1080 resolution for the game to work as intended.

Made in Game Maker Studio 2+
